name: JennyBee
description:
Ants are after your honey! Throw wax to block them or squish them. Eat ants to get wax back. Eat ants with honey for a permanent speed boost.

You win when the ants stop coming. Game over when your hive falls.

To play on other OS:

  • Download LOVE for your OS https://love2d.org/
  • Download the LOVE data file
  • Run the data file in LOVE
Controls

Keyboard

  • Move: arrow keys
  • Shoot wax: Z
  • Quit: Alt+F4

Gamepad

  • Move: left analog or D-pad
  • Shoot wax: Xbox X button, PS Square button, or Nintendo Y button
